sn48.43:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakete viharati anjanavane migadaye.
sn48.43:1.4: “atthi nu kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma yani pancindriyani tani panca balani honti, yani panca balani tani pancindriyani honti”ti?
sn48.43:2.1: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti …pe…
sn48.43:3.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma yani pancindriyani tani panca balani honti, yani panca balani tani pancindriyani honti.
sn48.43:4.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma yani pancindriyani tani panca balani honti, yani panca balani tani pancindriyani honti?
sn48.43:4.2: Yam, bhikkhave, saddhindriyam tam saddhabalam, yam saddhabalam tam saddhindriyam;
sn48.43:4.3: yam viriyindriyam tam viriyabalam, yam viriyabalam tam viriyindriyam;
sn48.43:4.4: yam satindriyam tam satibalam, yam satibalam tam satindriyam;
sn48.43:4.5: yam samadhindriyam tam samadhibalam, yam samadhibalam tam samadhindriyam;
sn48.43:4.6: yam pannindriyam tam pannabalam, yam pannabalam tam pannindriyam.
sn48.43:4.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara, tassa majjhe dipo.
sn48.43:4.8: Atthi, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma tassa nadiya eko sototveva sankhyam gacchati.
sn48.43:4.9: Atthi pana, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma tassa nadiya dve sotanitveva sankhyam gacchanti.
sn48.43:5.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma tassa nadiya eko sototveva sankhyam gacchati?
sn48.43:5.2: Yanca, bhikkhave, tassa dipassa purimante udakam, yanca pacchimante udakam—
sn48.43:5.3: ayam kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma tassa nadiya eko sototveva sankhyam gacchati.
sn48.43:6.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma tassa nadiya dve sotanitveva sankhyam gacchanti?
sn48.43:6.2: Yanca, bhikkhave, tassa dipassa uttarante udakam, yanca dakkhinante udakam—
sn48.43:6.3: ayam kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma tassa nadiya dve sotanitveva sankhyam gacchanti.
sn48.43:6.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yam saddhindriyam tam saddhabalam, yam saddhabalam tam saddhindriyam;
sn48.43:6.5: yam viriyindriyam tam viriyabalam, yam viriyabalam tam viriyindriyam;
sn48.43:6.6: yam satindriyam tam satibalam, yam satibalam tam satindriyam;
sn48.43:6.7: yam samadhindriyam tam samadhibalam, yam samadhibalam tam samadhindriyam;
sn48.43:6.8: yam pannindriyam tam pannabalam, yam pannabalam tam pannindriyam.
sn48.43:6.9: Pancannam, bhikkhave, indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
